



```{r}
trape<-matrix()

trian<-matrix()

trian1<-matrix()

tam<-1000

x<-seq(0,1,length.out=tam)

a<-0.3
b<-0.4
c<-0.5
d<-0.7

for (j in 1:tam) {
  
  p1<-(x[j]-a)/(b-a)
  p2<-(d-x[j])/(d-c)
  
  p3<-min(p1,1,p2)
  
  trape[j]<-max(p3,0)
  
}



a<-0.0
b<-0.2
c<-0.6


for (j in 1:tam) {
  
  p1<-(x[j]-a)/(b-a)
  p2<-(c-x[j])/(c-b)
  
  p3<-min(p1,p2)
  
  trian[j]<-max(p3,0)
  
}



a<-0.6
b<-0.7
c<-0.8


for (j in 1:tam) {
  
  p1<-(x[j]-a)/(b-a)
  p2<-(c-x[j])/(c-b)
  
  p3<-min(p1,p2)
  
  trian1[j]<-max(p3,0)
  
}







plot(x,trape, type="l", xlab = "% de humedad (h)", col="red", ylab = "u(h)", main= "humedad",lwd=3,frame=FALSE, font.lab = 2,font.axis = 2)
lines(x,trian, col="green", lwd=3)
lines(x,trian1, col="blue", lwd=3)

```
